## Maintenance Type
- [ ] Code cleanup
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Documentation updates

- [ ] Security updates
- [ ] Other

## Description
Describe the maintenance task that needs to be performed.

## Expected Outcome
What should be the result after this maintenance is completed?

## Priority Level
- [ ] Low
- [ ] Medium
- [ ] High
- [ ] Critical

## Additional Notes
Add any other context or notes about the maintenance task here.
